commit.message:
ARQ-229 Split api and impl

- moved annotations and exception to api the impl details to impl

ARQ-361 Update to Arquillian Core 1.0.0.Beta1

- merged PerformanceResultStore and PerformanceVerifier into PerformanceAnalyzer.
changed scope to EventContext<Test>
